None.Name: Mass Disintegration
None.Description: Disintegrates up to 6 targets simultaneously over time. Target units will be paralyzed during disintegration and cannot be attacked by other units. If the spell is interrupted prematurely the targets will be released unharmed. When disintegrating more than 1 target at the same time the spell will apply an increasing damage on the fortress that gets more harmful the more targets it affects.

en.Description: Mass Disintegration: +8% disintegration speed (-1s per 1K life)
Mass Disintegration: +8% disintegration speed (-1s per 1K life) and -10 damage per second done to itself per target if disintegrating multiple targets.
Mass Disintegration: +8% disintegration speed (-1s per 1K life)

de.Description: Mass Disintegration: +8% disintegration speed (-1s per 1K life)

ru.Description: Mass Disintegration: +8% disintegration speed (-1s per 1K life)
Mass Disintegration: +8% disintegration speed (-1s per 1K life) and -10 damage per second done to itself per target if disintegrating multiple targets.
Mass Disintegration: +8% disintegration speed (-1s per 1K life)

Extra.en:
Mass Disintegration disintegrates at a rate of 12s per 1000 lifepoints of its target at U0,  11s at U1,  10s at U2 and 9s at U3
Damage done to the structure is 60 damage per second at U0,  50 damage at U2
